content.rendered:
Directed by Malhotra P. Siddharth

Written by Anckur Chaudhry. Sidharth Malhotra. Ambar Hadap. Ganesh Pandit. Anckur Chaudhry

Cast Rani Mukerji (Naina Mathur). Rohit Saraf (Akshay). Hussain Dalal (Vinay). Jannat Zubair Rahmani (Natasha Khanna). Sachin (Prabhakar Mathur). Ivan Rodrigues (Principal).Poorti Jai Agarwal. Neeraj Kabi (Mr. Wadia). Vikram Gokhale (Mr. Khan). Harsh Mayar (Aatish). Supriya Pilgaonkar (Sudha Mathur). Asif Basra (Shyamlal (School Peon)). Shivkumar Subramaniam (St Notker’s Principal). Naisha Khanna (Young Naina). Mohammad Salman Khan (Salman). Farida Patel Venkat (Principal 1). Anjuman Saxena (Panelist 2). Deependra Singh(Aryan).Riya Shukla. Jiten Mukhi (Principal 2). Benjamin Yangal (Ashwin). Adreeja Sharma (Older Tamannah). Anuradha Rajadhyaksha (Teacher). Kkunal Shinde (Supporting (as Kunal Shiinde)). Leena Acharya (Female Teacher 2). Vikrant Soni (Killam). Dhaval A. Barbhaya (Male Teacher 1). Pankaj Anand (Older Killam). Sparsh Khanchandani (Oru). Indu Prasad (To be bride). Harish Khatri (Principal – School 1). Aman Gandotra (9A Boy 2). Govind Pathak (Shagufta’s Father).Kamal D. Khatak. Kunal Shinde (Older Pankaj). Farhan Patel (Waiter).Siddhesh Pardhi.Jayesh Kardak. Anjum Khan (Ashwin’s Mother).Swaraj Kumar. Samay Thakkar (Panelist 3). Suprio Bose (Mr. Pereira). Rajkumar (Older Raghu). Nisha Goel (Older Teena). Samar Katyaan (Older Aatish). Vivek Naithani (Older Ravinder). Kabeer Khan (9F Boy 1). Gauri Borkar (Tamannah’s Mother). Master Aarushi Rana (Brutus).Shagufta Shaikh. Master Maan Parmar (Boy – School 1). Saad Kashnani (9A Boy 1). Master Ritesh Bhanushali (Young Vinay). Akansha Parihar (Older Oru). Mohammed Iqbal (Hindi Teacher). Kirti Ghuge Sagle (Older Shagufta). Harshita Singh(Older Tara). Sushil Verma (Killam’s Father). Arshad Shekhal Pathan (Older Ashwin). Teena Kumar (9F Girl 1). Gurpreet Singh(Older Kabir). Master Bilal Chandiwala (Ceaser). Mriganav Dutta (Lab Assistant). Abhilasha Singh Kalwani (Panelist 1). Deena Bhim (Peon – School 1). Kapil Kumar (Older Omnish). Dinesh Goel (Older Sahil). Riddhi Arora (Sunidhi). Sahi Vitthal Chorge (9F Boy 2). Kalaivanan Kannan (Raghu). Archana Rangani (Arundhati / Oru’s Mother)

Languages Hindi

Producers Aditya Chopra. Hetvi Karia. Bharat Rawail. Maneesh Sharma. Brent Shields. Sanjay Shivalkar. Aashish Singh. Amit Tomar

Production Yash Raj Film
